The MCMC analysis was run until convergence with sampling every 100 000 generations. Convergence was assessed by estimating the effective sampling size (ESS) after 10% burn‐in using Tracer v.1.7 software ( http://tree.bio.ed.ac.uk/software/tracer/), and accepting ESS values of 300 or more. The uncertainty of the estimates is indicated by 95% highest marginal likelihoods estimated
6 by path sampling (PS)/stepping stone (SS) methods.
